meanings: (있던 곳에서 다른 곳으로) leave, (formal) depart, go off (to)
(출발하다) leave, start off, set off, (formal) depart, (차량이) pull out
You will go through sufferings if you leave home

vlive.korean: 여행 떠나면 되게... If I were to travel... 듣기 View video NCT : 이툥이툥 여러분 안툥
이렇게 같이 여정을 떠나면 너무 좋지 않을까요? If I take a new journey with them, it would be great. Don't you think? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] INFINITE NAM WOO HYUN X LieV - 인피니트 남우현의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: If I take a new journey with them, it would be great. Don't you think?

vlive.korean: 여러분, 저희 떠나면 안돼요. Hey everyone, don't leave us. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 ' 나 숨 못 쉬나봐 긴장 하고 있나봐 이런 날 어떻게 해 baby'
그래도 함께 못 떠나면... But if you can't leave with us... 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 2화 ep.6 포토크루 완전체 결성! 마지막 비밀 크루는?
vlive.english: But if you can't leave with us...

vlive.korean: 그러면 이제 우리는 위로 떠나면 될 것 같고요. It's now time to go up. 듣기 View video MAGIC STRAWBERRY SOUND : [하상욱×옥상달빛] 좋은생각 발매기념 라이브
vlive.english: It's now time to go up.

examples.korean: She will be greatly missed when she leaves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 떠나면 대단히 그리울 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She will be greatly missed when she leaves. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The movie's at six; if we leave at five-fifteen, we should have plenty of time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 영화가 6시에 시작하니까, 5시 15분에 떠나면 시간이 충분할 거예요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The movie's at six; if we leave at five-fifteen, we should have plenty of time. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I thought the company wasn't going to hire anyone to take Olivia's place when she retired. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 올리비아가 떠나면 그녀 자리에 아무도 안 앉힐 줄 알았는데. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I thought the company wasn't going to hire anyone to take Olivia's place when she retired. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh, he thought I was so attractive that he never wanted me to be away from him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오, 그는 내가 너무 매력적이어서 그의 곁을 한시도 떠나면 안 된다고 생각했어 YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, he thought I was so attractive that he never wanted me to be away from him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You will run into danger if you leave home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 집을 떠나면 넌 위험에 처할 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You will run into danger if you leave home. Add to Wordbook
